column2: Unlocks a decision to start with money or event troops for the created character.
Permanently Remove UI Enhancements Cheats Menu
Enables cheats that let you play as any other ruler and change anyone's name.
Assume control of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName.GetDynName]§! as your player character
Disable cheats that let you play as any other ruler and change anyone's name.
